description: ff. 78, incompl. at end. 192 x 150; 155 x 105 mm. 22 lin. Maghribi. 18th/19th cen. Probably identical with his Ibtisām al-ʻarūs (Brockelmann, GAL,: ghurūs): Brockelmann, GAL, S II, 357 (1b); Sarkīs, Muʻjam, col. 688; Fihris makhṭūṭāt al-Maktabah al-Aḥmadīyah bi-Tūnis, I, p. 455. Incip.: ... هو الشىخ ابوالعباس أحمد بن عبدالله بن محمد بن ابى بکر بن عروس الهوارى
author: Rāshidī, ʻUmar ibn Aḥmad, 15th cent
title: al-Taʻrīf bi-al-shaykh al-walī al-ṣāliḥ sayyidī Aḥmad ibn ʻArūs.
creator: Rāshidī, ʻUmar ibn Aḥmad, 15th cent
subject: Ibn ʻArūs, Aḥmad, d. 1463 or 4.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
